summary: This is a monthly asset account portfolio statement from Morgan Guaranty Trust Company for the Financial Trust Company, Inc. for October 1999. It details significant cash movements, including a $25 million deposit and an $18.3 million wire transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell's account at Bear Stearns, revealing a financial connection.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the recipient of an $18.3 million wire transfer from the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account to her account at Bear Stearns.

persons.name: Scott
persons.context: Listed as an account officer or service specialist for the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account at Morgan Guaranty Trust.

persons.name: Dencker
persons.context: Listed as an account officer or service specialist for the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account at Morgan Guaranty Trust.

connections.description: A substantial wire transfer of $18.3 million was sent from the Financial Trust Company account to an account for Ghislaine Maxwell at Bear Stearns.
Both are listed as account officers or service specialists for the same Financial Trust Company account at Morgan Guaranty Trust.

events.title: Wire Transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An $18.3 million wire transfer was made from the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account to an account for Ghislaine Maxwell at Bear Stearns.

events.title: Large Deposit to Account
events.description: A $20 million deposit was made into the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account, followed by a $5 million deposit on October 4, totaling $25 million in new funds for the month.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154-1002 (Morgan Guaranty Trust Company of New York)
American Yacht Harbor (address for Financial Trust Company, Inc.)
Newark, DE 19713-2101 (Mailing address for statement inquiries)
keyFacts: A substantial wire transfer of $18,300,000 was sent from the Financial Trust Company, Inc. account to an account for Ghislaine Maxwell at Bear Stearns on October 19, 1999.
The Financial Trust Company account held over $6.7 million in a J.P. Morgan money market fund at the end of October 1999.
The account received $25 million in deposits in early October 1999 ($20M on Oct 1 and $5M on Oct 4) before the $18.3M transfer out.
The document is a confidential financial record from JPMorgan Chase, requested to be treated as confidential in legal proceedings (JPM-SDNY-00036863 etc.).
